description: hello! we are looking for a very sociable, attentive to customers, friendly and problem solving customer support manager . we offer a remote full-time employment. the headquarters is in the usa. the company provides a popular service for thousands of customers in usa. what you will do: • respond to customer inquiries and provide first contact resolution of customer issues via email (zendesk) . • deliver timely and accurate responses to customer questions and requests. • turning potential negative customer situations into positive experiences. • display a professional, positive, and enthusiastic demeanor to customers. • escalate unresolved queries to the next level of support or to the developers. • provide exceptional customer experience as measured through customer surveys. requirements: - advanced english fluency. - exceptional written communication skills. - excellent communication and presentation skills. - self motivated, smart, enthusiastic, positive attitude. - highly organized, you can manage and prioritize several tasks. - customer service skills, ability to communicate with people and to solve their problems. please feel free to send us your cv!
name: customersupportmanager(fluentenglish)
key_skills: Customer Support|Английский язык|Грамотная речь|Грамотность|Работа с большим объемом информации|Клиентоориентированность|Zendesk
